product_name: PUMA Hybrid Trail Run Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Don't let the weather keep you from your run; the women's PUMA Hybrid Trail Run Jacket is ready for it. Front, shoulders and chest feature a laminated softshell fabric for head-on and vertical weather/wind protection. Lightweight and quiet single-layer softshell has mechanical stretch in underarms and on back for lightweight wind resistance and sleek mobility. 2 hidden zips on chest are backed with mesh lining for venting. Reflective elements on the women's Hybrid Trail Run Jacket from PUMA let you be seen from all sides. Closeout.
short_description: Don't let the weather keep you from your run; the women's PUMA Hybrid Trail Run Jacket is ready for it.
